channel.title: Quick Favor... < 2 days to do it
channel.description: I need somebody to buy 700 rune crossbows from me (9 mil) lowest price each. I've got 2 days members credit left and these arent selling AT ALL. I need somebody rich to come and save me; I'm not renewing membership. I got less than two days now, and casey cant do it for -reasons-.

item.title: Quick Favor... < 2 days to do it
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Ollie:

I think you will find that’s scamming.

(10:07:16 PM) TeleNubby: no its not scamming (10:07:21 PM) TeleNubby: i consider it more like (10:07:39 PM) TeleNubby: "taking every perfect possibility that opens up to me" (10:07:43 PM) TeleNubby: :) (10:08:11 PM) TeleNubby: plus he lost it (10:08:15 PM) TeleNubby: his fault (10:08:19 PM) TeleNubby: so idc (10:08:20 PM) TeleNubby: etc

Read full topic
item.source: Quick Favor... < 2 days to do it

item.title: Quick Favor... < 2 days to do it
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:8, topic:256714”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=339054.msg2630076#msg2630076 date=1232097236]
Why did you even buy rune crossbows? And can’t you just leave them in grand exchange?
[/quote]Naw. I sold this account for $80 USD not too long ago. The idiot got it lost and asked for me to recover it. I was expecting a “sorry not enough information”; even the recoveries were changed. I typed in my old recovs, didnt supply membership pin, and then in the extra messages at the bottom I wrote “these are my old recovs as they have been changed from me without my permission” etc. Worked like a charm.

Sold the account with 180k on it. Just got it back yesterday, now it has 17m (including the 700 rune xbows).

Chassy keep your private chat on; I’ll add you and I’ll be on at 5 central.

they will sell if you leave them in ge and you are f2p

I’d do that but I’d rather not take the risk, and if they can be sold before that then its all good.[/quote]

I think you will find that’s scamming.

Read full topic
item.source: Quick Favor... < 2 days to do it

item.title: Quick Favor... < 2 days to do it
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:5, topic:256714”]Why did you even buy rune crossbows? And can’t you just leave them in grand exchange?[/quote]Naw. I sold this account for $80 USD not too long ago. The idiot got it lost and asked for me to recover it. I was expecting a “sorry not enough information”; even the recoveries were changed. I typed in my old recovs, didnt supply membership pin, and then in the extra messages at the bottom I wrote “these are my old recovs as they have been changed from me without my permission” etc. Worked like a charm.

Sold the account with 180k on it. Just got it back yesterday, now it has 17m (including the 700 rune xbows).

Chassy keep your private chat on; I’ll add you and I’ll be on at 5 central.

Ollie:

they will sell if you leave them in ge and you are f2p

I’d do that but I’d rather not take the risk, and if they can be sold before that then its all good.

Read full topic
